00024 #include "endian.hpp"
00025 #include "util/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 
00032 
00033 void test()
00034 {
00035     unsigned char bytes[] = {0xce, 0xfa, 0xca, 0xca, 0xfe, 0xca, 0x20, 0x04};
00036     unsigned int n = *reinterpret_cast<unsigned int*>(bytes);
00037 
00038     #if defined(PWIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
00039     unit_assert(n == 0xcacaface);
00040     unit_assert(endianize32(n) == 0xcefacaca);
00041     #elif defined(PWIZ_BIG_ENDIAN)
00042     unit_assert(n == 0xcefacaca);
00043     unit_assert(endianize32(n) == 0xcacaface);
00044     #endif
00045 
00046     unsigned long long m = *reinterpret_cast<unsigned long long*>(bytes);
00047 
00048     #if defined(PWIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN)
00049     unit_assert(m == 0x420cafecacafacell);
00050     unit_assert(endianize64(m) == 0xcefacacafeca2004ll);
00051     #elif defined(PWIZ_BIG_ENDIAN)
00052     unit_assert(m ==  0xcefacacafeca2004ll);
00053     unit_assert(endianize64(m) ==  0x420cafecacafacell);
00054     #endif
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 int main()
00059 {
00060     try
00061     {
00062         test();
00063         return 0;
00064     }
00065     catch (exception& e)
00066     {
00067         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00068     }
00069     
00070     return 1;
00071 }
